K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:28b-1: bha ga b'an aa mi t'a bha dh'a ra n'i mantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-1: snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-6: aa mi ta sam bha be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-7: aa mi ta bi kr'anta k'a re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-8: aa mi ta ga ga na k'irti ka re sarba kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-9: gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las gyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-10: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-11: sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-12: bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-16: ma h'i du hi ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-17: lus la nad byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-18: nad khong skams su gyur kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-19: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-20: bsil yab kyis de la g-yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-21: gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-012:29a-23: bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs so //
